```{python}
import numpy as np
import skimage as ski
```

```{python}
camera = ski.data.camera()
```

```{python}
diamond = ski.morphology.diamond(radius=3)
```

```{python}
eroded = ski.morphology.erosion(camera, diamond)
```

```{python}
dilated = ski.morphology.dilation(camera, diamond)
```

```{python}
# Erosion is nothing but a footprint / min operation.
np.all(eroded == ski.filters.rank.minimum(camera, diamond))
```

```{python}
# Dilation is nothing but a footprint / max operation.
np.all(dilated == ski.filters.rank.maximum(camera, diamond))
```

```{python}
opened = ski.morphology.opening(camera, diamond)
closed = ski.morphology.closing(camera, diamond)
```

```{python}
# Opening is nothing but dilation applied to result of erosion.
np.all(opened == ski.morphology.dilation(eroded, diamond))
```

```{python}
# Closing is nothing but erosion applied to result of dilation.
np.all(closed == ski.morphology.erosion(dilated, diamond))
```
